lines.text: Mari tells me you're from Manhattan. What does your father do?
Oh, my parents are in the iron and steal business.
Iron and steel both together? How unusual.
Well, my mother irons and my father steals.
Junior, do you have a girlfriend?
Oh, yeah. I got lots of girlfriends just waiting to get me!
I don't think you do.
Well, you're right.
How'd we get into the sex-crime business anyway? My brother Saul, a plumber, makes twice as much money as I do and gets three weeks vacation, too.
The leaves are really beautiful.
Yup, they're really starting to change. I guess winter's comin' on!
Yup, Hey, I changed this winter!
What do you mean, you changed?
I mean, my breasts filled out!
[Phyllis laughs]
I mean, they were nothing last summer!
I didn't know you last summer!
Well, they have!
Well, congratulations!
Listen to daddy. I want you to take the gun, and I want you to put it in your mouth, and I want you to turn around and blow your brains out. Blow your brains out. BLOW YOUR BRAINS OUT!

[tired, while chasing Phyllis]
Oh, man. I gotta give up cigarettes!
Are you folks on vacation?
No, we're sort of, um, on a business trip.
Well what sort of business are you in?
Plumbing.
Insurance.
Well, which is it?
You see, we're actually in both. We sell insurance to plumbing companies. You know, in case they steal some toilets or something.
[Krug is trying to get his girlfriend to have sex with him]
Why don't you lay back and enjoy being inferior?
We don't wanna off someone first night out. I mean, it'd be a shame to get this floor all messed up with blood.
Piss your pants!
What?
I said, "Piss your pants!"
You sick mother!
I wonder what the meanest, foulest, rottenest, woodsiest sex crime ever was? Hey, Krug, what do you think the sex crime of the century was?
You must think we're stupid, right? No, we're not stupid. We might be horny old pigs, but we ain't stupid.
I think it's crazy.
What's crazy?
All that blood and violence. I thought you were supposed to be the love generation.
Listen.
What?
I hear something.
All I hear is you, you damn fool.
Shhh!
[Deputy puts his head down on the road]
Who the hell do you think you are, Tonto?
Look at this.
What?

[showing pictures of Mari]
Guess who lives here?
Huh, I wonder what the odds are on that?
Couldn't even tell you.
Goddamn high-class, tight-ass freakos. All that goddamn silverware. Who do they think they are, anyway? People in China eat with sticks, and these freaks got 16 utensils for every pea on the plate.

[to Estelle]
I could make love to a looker like you with my hands tied behind my back.
If God had meant women to go around with their busts exposed, Mari Collingwood, he wouldn't have given us clothes!

[trying to sound professional]
We have the law on our side, Ada.
Yeah, but I have the chickens AND the truck!
Mari, would you hurry up?

[in shower]
Okay okay. Drill sergeant.
How'd you like me to put my boot up your ass... sideways?
How's your back, baby?
You call the repair service?
Mmhmmm.
Well did you tell them I was a physician and had to have a phone?
No, actually I told them you were an international bookie, and I was ten-months pregnant with quintuplets!

[looking at Mari's shirt]
Hey, no bra?
Of course not! Nobody wears those anymore!
Nobody except us drill sergeants.
Yeah, but look, Estelle. You can see her nipples as plain as day!
Daddy, don't be so clinical!

The daring daylight escape of the two convicted murderers, dope-pushers, and rapists cost the lives of two prison guards, and surprisingly, the life of a German Shepard. According to eye-witness reports, the animal, which was set after the two fleeing men, was kicked to death by a young animal-like woman who leaped from the get-away car. The alleged driver of the car was Junior Stillo. Junior Stillo is the illegitimate son of the leader of the two escapees, Krug Stillo, who was serving a life sentence for the 1966 triple-slaying of a priest and two nuns. Krug Stillo is reputed to have hooked his own son on heroin to control the youngster's life. The man is armed, and considered extremely dangerous. The second escaped convict is identified as Fred Weasel Podowski, who has a long police record for child molesting, peeping tom-ism, and assault with a deadly weapon. The three men were accompanied in their getaway by an unknown woman, who's described only as young, strong, and animal-like. Police believe the four may still be in the New York City area, but expect them to try to leave the state in the next 48 hours.
Being in this house makes me wish I was a lady!
Are you sure we're not going to put you folks to any trouble?
Oh, nonsense! Our home is yours.
Mari, she was a lot tougher than you, doc. She took a while to kill. She was really tough. We had a hard time with her, but you're just a pussy!
Leave Sadie alone, you little toad, or I'll bust your butt with a lily pad.
You stupid dyke!
[first lines]

[to dog]
Hello, Cassie! Hiya, girl! Hello, there! Now, let's see.
[looks through mail]

Ah, it looks like Mari's getting cards from half the civilized world. Mari Collingwood. Mari Collingwood. Mari Collingwood. You'd think she's the only kid to reach the age of 17. Of course she is probably the prettiest piece I've ever seen.
